Package io.wcm.caravan.rhyme.api.server

Interface HalResponseRendererBuilder

  • @ProviderType
public interface HalResponseRendererBuilder
    A fluent builder for AsyncHalResponseRenderer instances which is only used in advanced integration scenarios. As a regular user of the framework, simply use RhymeBuilder instead.
    See Also:
    RhymeBuilder, Rhyme.renderResponse(LinkableResource)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      AsyncHalResponseRenderer build()  
      static HalResponseRendererBuilder create()  
      HalResponseRendererBuilder withAnnotationTypeSupport​(HalApiAnnotationSupport additionalTypeSupport)
      Extend the core framework to support additional annotation types in your annotated HAL API interfaces.
      HalResponseRendererBuilder withExceptionStrategy​(ExceptionStatusAndLoggingStrategy customStrategy)
      Allow the exception handling of the core framework to support additional platform / framework specific exceptions.
      HalResponseRendererBuilder withMetrics​(RequestMetricsCollector metricsSharedWithClient)
      Provide the RequestMetricsCollector instance that was used to capture and measure all interaction with the HalApiClient for the current incoming request.
      HalResponseRendererBuilder withObjectMapper​(com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectMapper objectMapper)
      Replace the default Jackson ObjectMapper used for JSON serialization with a customized instance
      HalResponseRendererBuilder withReturnTypeSupport​(HalApiReturnTypeSupport additionalTypeSupport)
      Extend the core framework to support additional return types in your annotated HAL API interfaces.
      HalResponseRendererBuilder withRhymeDocsSupport​(RhymeDocsSupport rhymeDocsSupport)
      Enable generation of "curies" links (to HTML documentation generated with the rhyme-docs-maven-plugin) when rendering HalResponses with Rhyme.renderResponse(LinkableResource).

    • Method Detail

      • create

        static HalResponseRendererBuilder create()
        Returns:
        a new builder instance with no customizations applied

      • withMetrics

        HalResponseRendererBuilder withMetrics​(RequestMetricsCollector metricsSharedWithClient)
        Provide the RequestMetricsCollector instance that was used to capture and measure all interaction with the HalApiClient for the current incoming request.
        Parameters:
        metricsSharedWithClient - the same instance that was used to create the HalApiClient
        Returns:
        this

      • withRhymeDocsSupport

        HalResponseRendererBuilder withRhymeDocsSupport​(RhymeDocsSupport rhymeDocsSupport)
        Enable generation of "curies" links (to HTML documentation generated with the rhyme-docs-maven-plugin) when rendering HalResponses with Rhyme.renderResponse(LinkableResource). If you call this method, you also have to ensure that you actually serve the generated HTML files using RhymeDocsSupport.loadGeneratedHtml(RhymeDocsSupport, String)
        Parameters:
        rhymeDocsSupport - the SPI instance that handles loading of the generated HTML
        Returns:
        this

      • withReturnTypeSupport

        HalResponseRendererBuilder withReturnTypeSupport​(HalApiReturnTypeSupport additionalTypeSupport)
        Extend the core framework to support additional return types in your annotated HAL API interfaces. You can call this method multiple times if you want to register more than one extension.
        Parameters:
        additionalTypeSupport - extension to the default type support
        Returns:
        this

      • withAnnotationTypeSupport

        HalResponseRendererBuilder withAnnotationTypeSupport​(HalApiAnnotationSupport additionalTypeSupport)
        Extend the core framework to support additional annotation types in your annotated HAL API interfaces. You can call this method multiple times if you want to register more than one extension.
        Parameters:
        additionalTypeSupport - extension to the default type support
        Returns:
        this

      • withExceptionStrategy

        HalResponseRendererBuilder withExceptionStrategy​(ExceptionStatusAndLoggingStrategy customStrategy)
        Allow the exception handling of the core framework to support additional platform / framework specific exceptions. You can call this method multiple times if you want to register more than one extension.
        Parameters:
        customStrategy - extension to the default exception handling.
        Returns:
        this

      • withObjectMapper

        HalResponseRendererBuilder withObjectMapper​(com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectMapper objectMapper)
        Replace the default Jackson ObjectMapper used for JSON serialization with a customized instance
        Parameters:
        objectMapper - a configured ObjectMapper instance (which can be a single shared instance)
        Returns:
